Title: Relates to increasing the penalty for larceny and criminal mischief during a declaration of a state of emergency by the governor
Summary: Relates to increasing the penalty for larceny and criminal mischief during a declaration of a state of emergency by the governor, when committed within the geographical area where the state of emergency is in effect.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing the penalty for larceny and criminal mischief during a declaration of a state of emergency by the governor, when committed within the geographical area where the state of emergency is in effect
